greetings: He-hey, howdy! Nice to meet you.

generate-meme-conversation.ask-meme-type: Choose the meme to be generated:
generate-meme-conversation.unsupported-m: Can't make such meme for now, choose another category.
generate-meme-conversation.unknown-comma: Couldn't find that menu option, sorry.
settings-types.font.title: Text font look
settings-types.font.description: The font look of texts in memes (applied for this chat only).
settings-types.color.title: Text color
settings-types.color.description: The color of texts in memes (applied for this chat only).
settings-types.shadow.color.title: Text shadow font
settings-types.shadow.color.description: The color of shadows of texts in memes (applied for this chat only).
settings-types.demotivational.bg.color.d: The background color of a demotivational poster meme.
settings-types.demotivational.border.col: The border color of a demotivational poster meme.
settings-types.show-author.title: Mention me
settings-types.show-author.description:
Make messaging platform, ID, Name and Surname (or just username) of current user be mentioned in the meme's description.
Note: mentioning is applied only for generated memes, user-made memes are not public.
manage-bank.info:
ℹ️ Bank (data-pack) information.

🆔 ID: :Id
💬 Title: :Title
📄 Description: :Description
🕒 Created: :Created_at
🕒 Updated: :Updated_at
👤 Conversation ID: :Conversation_id
👤 Conversation title: :conversation_title
manage-bank.not-found-error: Bank (data-pack) was internally deleted or moved (not found).
manage-bank.error-exception: Sorry, but something went wrong while managing the bank:
chaining-bank.learn-the-pair.type-target: Enter the first word (phrase) of the pair:
chaining-bank.learn-the-pair.type-next-w: Enter the second word (phrase) of the pair:
chaining-bank.learn-the-text.send-the-te:
Send me text to learn (to make pairs and remember).

Punctuation marks to divide sentences: . ... ! ? ?! !?
chaining-bank.random-menu.hint: Choose the number of pairs to be generated:
language.selection-error: Current language is not available for now: English will be used instead. Type 'lang' to see the list of available ones.
unknown-command.phrase-1: Sorry, but I didn't understand you 😒
unknown-command.phrase-2: I can't find the right pattern to answer your request 😒
unknown-command.phrase-4: Well... sounds good, but I still can't understand you.
unknown-command.phrase-6: Wow... I can't even say anything...
